context_bundle.summary: Streamlined MCP creation workflow. 4 phases: Research (load MCP doors, check SDK docs), Setup (create project, add NuGet packages), Implement (tools with McpServerTool attribute, descriptions), Deploy (build, config claude_desktop_config.json, restart Claude).

onboarding.quick_start: 1. Load T01MCP+T05MCP_ARCH for protocol knowledge. 2. Check available runtimes (dotnet/node/python). 3. Create project: dotnet new console + add ModelContextProtocol --prerelease. 4. Implement tools: [McpServerToolType] class + [McpServerTool(Name='x'), Description('y')] methods. 5. Build Release. 6. Add to claude_desktop_config.json mcpServers. 7. Restart Claude Desktop.
known_errors: McpServerToolAttribute constructor - use Name= property not positional
SDK preview - APIs may change between versions
